name: AnsweringMachine
0:
”Alexa, open Answering Machine”
”Alexa, ask Answering Machine if I'll be rich when I grow up”
”Alexa, start Answering Machine”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: answering machine
des: Ask The Answering Machine yes/no questions any time, and it'll provide a randomly-selected response (some variation of yes, no, or maybe). You'll hear cool sounds as well as some funny responses! You can ask as many questions as you want as often as you want. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
